events.question: Kevin? What are you doing in the tutorial area?

events.choice: I want to do the tutorial.

events.text:
I see. In that case, I will help!

How about you talk to the person further on down the path from here? He will tell you what to do.

events.choice: I am here to "mess around", as they say.

events.text:
I see...you want to "mess around", huh? Well, alright then!

How about you try messing around with the tutorial? Just talk to the guy further on down the path!
